help-overlay.title: Help
help-overlay.subtitle: Rules of Mastermind
help-overlay.paragraph1: Mastermind is a logic game where you have to guess the secret color combination. The computer selects a combination of colors, and you try to guess it.
help-overlay.paragraph2: The colors must be dragged and dropped onto the game board. When all fields of a row (round) are filled, a button labeled “Check” appears to the right of the row, allowing you to evaluate your input.
help-overlay.paragraph3: Under Options, you can customize the game board, for example by changing the number of colors or the size of the board.
